item.title: Left outside my house, 13th December
item.description:
Been parked there for weeks with no MOT. Been hit a few times. Drivers side of vehicle damaged. Reported vehicle twice to the police and had no response. Almost parked over our drop curb

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 49, Broomwood Road, St Paul's Cray, Greater London

item.title: Rubbish collecting at the back and side of Hashtings House, behind locked gate so residents cannot do anything to clear it. Causing vermin and smell outside building windows., 13th December
item.description:
This is rubbish that has been collecting over last few months and is not accessible to residents or bin men to clean as behind a locked gate. Rats have been seen and the smell means we cannot open windows in the block. This rubbish is behind the side/back of Hastings House behind a locked gate.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Mulgrave Road, Woolwich
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Random bike locked to front fence of property, 13th December
item.description:
On the first day of the Festive Market on Amhurst Road, a bike random bike has been padlocked to the front fence of a street-facing residential property. It would help for future if traders and the public can be guided to the bike stands at Hackney Central
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Amhurst Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Abandoned car - illegally parkdd, 13th December
item.description:
